description: Creates a logical container to where backups may be copied. This request includes a name, the Region, the maximum number of retention days, the minimum number of retention days, and optionally can include tags and a creator request ID.

parameters.name: BackupVaultName
parameters.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Logically air-gapped backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Region where they are created.

parameters.name: BackupVaultTags
parameters.description: The tags to assign to the vault. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: CreatorRequestId
parameters.description: The ID of the creation request. This parameter is optional. If used, this parameter must contain 1 to 50 alphanumeric or ---_.' characters.

parameters.name: MinRetentionDays
parameters.description: This setting specifies the minimum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points. The minimum value accepted is 7 days.

parameters.name: MaxRetentionDays
parameters.description: The maximum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultName
nested_items.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Logically air-gapped backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Region where they are created.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the vault.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the vault was created.

nested_items.name: VaultState
nested_items.description: The current state of the vault.
